filterSettings.description: all relevant attributes for filtering troovs

dateFilters.description: all filters relating to the details of the date

profileFilters.description: properties on a User's Profile which are filterable

items.description: * AMERICAN_INDIAN - A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent * EAST_ASIAN - A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent * BLACK - A person having origins in any of the black racial groups of Africa * HISPANIC - A person of Cuban, Mexican, Puerto Rican, South or Central American, or other Spanish culture or origin * MIDDLE_EASTERN - For example Egypt * PACIFIC_ISLANDER - A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands. * SOUTH_ASIAN - For example India * WHITE - A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Europe, the Middle East, or North Africa * NOT_DISCLOSED

verified.description: indicates whether or not the user's profile is verified

location.description: information pertaining to a specific location

locationHidden.description: used to obscure the location of a troov (will add random noise to coordinates)

locationIndicator.description: Instead of using the composition anyOf because it creates additional complexity to support on the client side, we define a composition class which handles both the case where the location is provided and hidden. When location is hidden, then only the hiddenLocation field will be populated.

hidden.description: indicates if the location is hidden from the consumer

hiddenLocation.description: used to obscure the location of a troov (will add random noise to coordinates)

verified.description: indicates whether or not the user's profile is verified

status.description:
Status of the match request:
 * CONFIRMED                 | The creator of the troov has approved the match request
 * PENDING                   | The troov creator has not confirmed with any other user
 * CANCELLED_BY_CREATOR      | The troov creator cancelled this troov
 * CANCELLED_BY_REQUESTER    | The requester cancelled this troov
 * COMPLETED                 | The troov creator went on a date with a confirmed user
 * NO_SHOW_BY_CREATOR        | The troov creator did not show up to the date
 * NO_SHOW_BY_REQUESTER      | The requester did not show up to the date

locationDetails.description: Instead of using the composition anyOf because it creates additional complexity to support on the client side, we define a composition class which handles both the case where the location is provided and hidden. When location is hidden, then only the hiddenLocation field will be populated.

hidden.description: indicates if the location is hidden from the consumer

hiddenLocation.description: used to obscure the location of a troov (will add random noise to coordinates)

location.description: information pertaining to a specific location

troovCoreDetails.description: Contains the details were are essential to a Troov

title.description: title for the date which appears in all the date preview tiles

details.description: any additional descriptions that the user would like to add to the date

tags.description: users will assign free form text tags to each date to improve searchability

matchRequests.description: a list of all the match requests

items.description: A single instance of a match request initiated by a user wanting to go on a date.

status.description:
Status of the match request:
 * CONFIRMED   | The creator of the troov has approved the request
 * DECLINED    | The creator of the troov has declined this request
 * PENDING     | The requester is still pending a reply from the troov creator
 * CANCELLED   | The requester has cancelled this troov request
